name: Improved Stonecunning
text: Your sense for stonework is uncanny.
benefit: You receive a +4 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework. This bonus replaces the stonecunning ability’s normal bonus on Perception checks.
mythicText: If you listen close, you can hear the secrets of stone.
mythicBenefit: You gain stone tell as a spell-like ability usable once per day with a caster level equal to twice your tier.
text_zh: 你对石造物的感知异常敏锐。
prerequisites_zh: 感知13，矮人，【岩石敏锐】种族特性。
benefit_zh: 当你使用察觉检定注意到不寻常的石造物时获得+4加值。这个加值会取代【岩石敏锐】种族特性对察觉检定的正常加值。
mythicText_zh: 若你仔细倾听，就能了解到岩石诉说的秘密。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你获得每日1次的石言术（Stone Tell）类法术能力，施法者等级等同于你的阶层的两倍。
